features: [Excellent Size] Our second-generation upgraded purple seat cushion (18 x 17 x 1.5 inch) is large than 90% of the cushions on the market and has no problem with deformation or collapse like small size seat pad. It fits 99% of chairs, reducing the pressure on your hips and thighs, giving you relief from the tailbone and lumbar spine pain problems for sedentary people, improve your comfort.

[Relieve Back Pain & Sciatica] Our purple seat cushion is designed according to the ergonomically designed with GEL material, soft and flexible. Makes your chair less stiff and helps relieve your sciatica, tailbone, hip or buttock pain. Supports you to sitting for a long time.

[Breathable and Cool] Different from memory foam cushions, the gel seat cushion is made up of thousands of air columns, perfect structure to keep the seat pad breathable. With air circulating quickly, bring your buttock coolling. It allows you to reduce sweating on your hips even in the chair.

[Widely Application] Not only is the purple gel seat cushion for office chair cushion, but also can be used as wheelchair cushions, car seat cushions, and desk chair cushion. Especially suitable for girls yoga, pregnant women, and even long trips to make your life happy. Besides, Our black set seat cushion is removable and supports machine washing to make it look brand new!

[Wide Range of Use] Box Packed, which is perfect as a gift for your loved ones, family, friends and colleagues, especially for office workers, drivers, and wheelchair users with back and tailbone pain, because it will give you a whole new experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top-notch cushion and tailbone saver!!!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is an amazing addition to any vehicle!!! I always suffered from tailbone pain and lower back soreness after sitting in a vehicle for extended periods, until I started using this cushion. My first test of this cushion was a 7 day 3500 mile drive and I had zero tailbone pain and no lower back soreness at all. Even with 12 hour days sitting behind the wheel I was pain free. These cushions are so amazing I bought one for my other vehicle and recommend them to my parents for their road trips. The removable cover is nice too, for washing if/when it gets spilled on and the non-slip bottom keeps the cushion firmly in place while driving. For anyone questioning if this is as good as it sounds, this is worth every penny and then some. With as good as this is in a car I am sure it will perform just as well on an office chair for working long hours too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my computer task chair
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased this cushion for my car but found that it raised me up a little too high for my lumbar support. I decided to use it on my task chair at my computer and it has been perfect! It increased the comfort of my task chair so much it’s like I’m sitting on air. Plus the material has even support so my sit bones aren’t feeling any pressure crom the seat. So glad i have this! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought 3 of these because of lower back problems. 1 for each car and 1 for each desk chair. They are comfortable, lightweight, and just seem perfect. I carry one into restaurants that i know do not have padded seats. Best cushions for the money and i have tried many!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sitting at my desk for 10 hours without back pain for the first time.... Ever.
reviews.reviewText: I want to start my review by saying that I have recently made several upgrades in my life, including a new bed and pillow, which I got a few weeks before getting this pad. Those things seemed to be helping my chronic back pain slightly, but sitting at my desk at work was still killing me.Today is my first day using this pad and after 10 hours sitting most of the time, no pain. I am going to see what happens and update over time but first impressions are that this thing is extremely comfortable and may have just fixed a problem I've had for years.I've tried lumbar supports and stretching routines, but today I am pain free for the first time in many many years.Only downside is that the pad is a little narrow for my wide butt. It doesn't seem to matter much, but an extra couple inches wouldn't have hurt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an alternative to another seat cushion I had which worked well to alleviate pain from my coccyx when sitting or driving for long periods. But that one was too tall. This one is made from gel, and although it gets flattened while sitting, it's enough of a cushion on the coccyx to do the job without lifting you up higher in your chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not help in the least.
reviews.reviewText: I had a two week stay in the hospital, and my bottom got sore from constantly being stuck in the bed.Once home, and back to my office job, I needed to find something. We had a few of those sciatic nerve cushions where there is a cutout in the back, and that seemed to work fine, but they are a bit bulky.So I started looking for something a little more practical. I found this one, which is not so thick, and covers the office chair fine, but sadly is no different than sitting in the chair by itself.I'm sure once my bottom gets a chance to heal up, this will be useful for using at event where we are sitting on benches, and so on... but as a treatment to lessen the pain as I heal, it does nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, and last year when I was pregnant my desk chair eventually became uncomfortable to sit in. This seat cushion was the perfect purchase. It offers the right level of support and has stood the test of time. I would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pad is very comfortable. Not too bulky. The size is big enough to cover the whole chair.

Very comfortable. Light weight and since the case it comes in has a handle it is easy to carry around. The seller gave me very good service by delivering it ahead of schedule when I really needed it before a plane flight.
